location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 6566/45 'Appt. of Lieut. Commander Clifton E. Perry, U.S. Naval Reserve, assigned U.S. Naval Observer at American Consulate, Aden.'

physicalDescription.extent: There is one paper in this file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 3; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of a single page announcing the succession of the post United States Naval Observer to the American Consulate at Aden.
